meanings.sent1: After lifting heavy boxes all day, I developed a backache.
meanings.sent2: She complained of a backache after sitting for hours at her desk.
meanings.sent3: The backache from carrying groceries made me feel like an old man.
meanings.sent4: The backache was a constant reminder of the need for proper posture.
meanings.sent5: The sharp backache shot through his spine, causing him to wince in pain.

meanings.definition: To experience pain in the back.
meanings.sent1: I backache every time I bend down to pick up my toddler.
meanings.sent2: He will backache if he doesn't lift the boxes correctly.
meanings.sent3: She backaches whenever she tries to touch her toes during yoga.
meanings.sent4: Backaching from the long drive, he stretched his arms above his head.
meanings.sent5: The thought of having to move heavy furniture made him backache preemptively.
